A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was born in 1971. I “was there” along with so many other people my age who feel that their childhood was\, in some ways\, defined by Star Wars. I’m a grown man with a family and a life\, but Star Wars will always have a special place in my heart - it’s important to me. The Last Jedi is a mess on so many levels. It feels like Rian Johnson just doesn’t quite get Star Wars. As a story teller\, I felt that he kept missing the mark and continually left me feeling emotionless. The Last Jedi is huge disappointment and frankly\, made me sad.
